document.full_text: the wife and daughter of libyan leader muammar gaddafi crossed the border into tunisia, a tunisian security source said, but it was unclear whether they were on a diplomatic mission or seeking safe haven.
document.title: gaddafi's wife and daughter in tunisia: source
lines_and_colors: the wife and daughter of libyan leader muammar gaddafi crossed the border into tunisia, a tunisian security source said, but it was unclear whether they were on a diplomatic mission or seeking safe haven.
